original_title: Learn Public Speaking: The Standard Deviants
overview: Does the idea of speaking in front of an audience fill you with dread? Relax! The Standard Deviants will help you overcome your fear of public speaking and help you deliver your message with style and flair!  Using proven attention-getters, illustrations, and delivery suggestions, this DVD will help you organize your thoughts and present them in a clear and persuasive manner.
title: Learn Public Speaking: The Standard Deviants
